answers.answer: If you test positive for preeclampsia, they HAVE to induce you- you will be having that baby the same day if you test positive because it reduces the amount of oxygen & nutrients your baby needs-- it also depends on what the levels in your urine are if they are high & low. Good luck!!

I went to a regular appointment and they check my bloodpresser and it was high so at end off appt they chacked it Agine and said I have preaclamca so I need to go to hospital and I was indused that day at 37 weeks.  Every doctor may be different. But It was unsaved for me and my child so it was better to get him out.  I was in hospital  for a week.  And sent home on bloodpresser meds.  Good luck to u.
Oh boy :p might be havin this baby today then :p its alil early but by now most babies are ok after a few days in nciu... i had 2 steriod shots the other day so that will also help her <3

So far ive had a range of mild to low proteins in my urine... not sure what that means :p... the procartia has been keepin my blood preasure back down but it was ranging at 140/95 last night n is normaly around 110/72
Why are u happy that uve got it may i ask

I dont think shes excited to have preeclamsia but more excited for her daughter to come. I follow alot of her posts & shes been ready for a while- phsycially & mentally! lol we both have- we are due the same day & we have the EXACT same things going on- high risk, ect. I think its just more exciting to her know she will be here very soon! I would be too!

I got diagnosed with it early:/ im 25 weeks n have preclempsia but i have to get monitored 1nc or 2times a wk n meet with my doctor every other week.lately everything has been fine so hopefully ne n ma bbygirl make it thru fine:) i kno gods watching over us:)
Im not happy lol i was saying oh boy as like someone would say oh boy what else could go wrong lol.

I kno same here:( cuz im far from family. My husband is locked up n i gota deal wit it on ma own:( doctors r stupid tho cuz mine wanted me to jus abort ma bby girl i got pissed off and walked out the doc office

The doctors will most probably admit you and try to keep everything under control until week 36 (blood pressure, proteins)  and closely monitor the baby not to be in distress. You'll be on strict bed rest until after delivery.
saramay14 - any news? How are you?

I had preclamsia in my last pregnancy really bad and im now 33 weeks and getting symtoms off it now im igore and excited to see him but i wud rather him stay in as long as he can for his sake and did they induce you in end

question: Im being tested for it :p 34weeks+4days blah i got a head ache, drs are checking my pee, blood preasure, monitoring contractions, and are gunna give me an ultrasound to check babys fluid. What i was wondering was if anyone has been diagnosed and what are they doing about it? If you had it in a previous pregnancy did they induce you early?
title: preclampsia
